newsitem.title: UK: EMAP's Peter Strong to leave the group.
newsitem.headline: EMAP's Peter Strong to leave the group.

text.p: British media group EMAP Plc said executive director Peter Strong, previously chief executive of EMAP's newspaper and printing division, will leave the group from October 31 to become chief executive at Eastern Counties Newspapers.
His move follows EMAP's sale of its regional newspapers and printing business to Johnston Press Plc in June.
